Module Breakout.Clone
Package Objects

Class Ball

java.lang.Object
Objects.Ball
Direct Known Subclasses:
RubberBall
public abstract class Ball extends Object
Ball class to initiate the ball used in the game

    • Ball

      public Ball(Point2D center, float radiusA, float radiusB, Color inner, Color border)
      Creates new ball object with specified center coordinates, radius, inner and border color
      Parameters:
      center - Coordinates for the center of the ball
      radiusA - Horizontal radius of the ball
      radiusB - Vertical radius of the ball
      inner - Inner color of the ball
      border - Border color of the ball
